price: 98. Yallaa kee kay malaykaay kay farmoytit kee jibriiliiy miikaa- iilih inkih Qaduwwi yekke Num, Toysa Diggah Yalli koroositeh у an marak Qaduwwi kinni.
arabic: مَن كَانَ عَدُوّٗا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَجِبۡرِيلَ وَمِيكَىٰلَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَدُوّٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna ʿaduwwan lillahi wamalāikatihi warusulihi wajib'rīla wamīkāla fa-inna al-laha ʿaduwwun lil'kāfirīna
